getCredentials(address).details: Function to retrieve credentials for a holder

params._holder: The address of the credential holder

returns._0: Array of Credential structs associated with the holder

issueCredential(address,string).details: Function to issue a credential to a holder

params._credentialHash: The hash of the credential data (e.g., generated from details)
params._holder: The address of the credential holder
The address of the credential holder
params._index: The index of the credential to revoke

params._newCredentialHash: The new hash of the credential data

verifyCredential(address,string).details: Verifies if a given credential hash exists and is not revoked for a holder

params._holder: The address of the credential holder

returns._0: true if the credential exists and is not revoked, otherwise false
